sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
    SimpleGrid,
    Box,
    Text,
    Image,
    Flex,
    Spacer
} from '@chakra-ui/react'

function DashboardMain(props){
    const dataItems = props.dataItems;
    const dataItem = dataItems.map((sm, index) =>{
        return(
        <Box
            display='flex'
            flexDirection='column'
            justifyContent='center'
            alignItems="center"
            borderTop="5px solid"
            borderTopColor={sm.color_sm}
            borderImage
            h='180px'
            bgColor='gray.200'
            key={index}>
                <Flex direction="row" mb={2}>
                    <Image src={sm.img_sm} alt="Facebbok" mr={2}/>
                    <Spacer />
                    <Text
                    color="gray.600"
                    >{sm.user_sm}</Text>
                </Flex>
                <Text
                fontWeight="black"
                size="xl"
                mb={2}>
                    {sm.followers_sm}
                </Text>
                <Text
                mb={2}>
                    {sm.name_item}
                </Text>
                <Flex
                direction="row"
                align="center"
                mb={2}>
                    <Image src={sm.icon} h="5px"/>
                    <Text>{sm.days_sm}</Text>
                </Flex>
        </Box>)
    })
    console.log(dataItem)
    return (
        <>
            <SimpleGrid columns={4} spacing={10}>
                {dataItem}
            </SimpleGrid>
        </>
    )
}

export default DashboardMain
